languages.text: Лорд-капитан был{mf||а} милосерд{mf|ен|на} — каждому из пленников выдали по однозарядной лазерной фузее и штыку, после чего отдали приказ: взять крейсер любой ценой. Уговор с ними был такой: те, кто уцелеет в атаке заслужат прощение Императора и смогут вступить в ряды освободительной армии. Щедрое предложение — во время войны, разговор с предателями обычно короткий.

The Lord Captain was merciful. Each captive was issued a single-shot las fusil and bayonet, whereupon an order was given to take the cruiser at any cost. The deal was that those who survived the attack would be granted the Emperor's pardon and could enlist in the liberation army. Traitors in wartime can seldom hope to be given a second chance, let alone an offer of such generosity.
languages.original_text: Лорд-капитан был{mf||а} милосерд{mf|ен|на} — каждому из пленников выдали по однозарядной лазерной фузее и штыку, после чего отдали приказ: взять крейсер любой ценой. Щедрое предложение — во время войны, разговор с предателями обычно короткий.

Traitors in wartime can seldom hope to be given a second chance, let alone an offer of such generosity.

languages.text: 舰长大人很仁慈，{mf|他|她}给每位俘虏发了一把单发激光燧发枪，配备了一把刺刀，命令他们不惜一切代价夺取巡洋舰。作为交换，所有在这场突击中存活下来的人都可以得到神皇的赦免，成为部队的正式成员。战争时期，所有叛徒几乎都会被当场处决，他们很少能有悔改的机会，更不用说得到如此慷慨的赦罪。
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain was merciful. Each captive was issued a single-shot las fusil and bayonet, whereupon an order was given to take the cruiser at any cost. The deal was that those who survived the attack would be granted the Emperor's pardon and could enlist in the liberation army. Traitors in wartime can seldom hope to be given a second chance, let alone an offer of such generosity.

traits.locale_text: 舰长大人很仁慈，{mf|他|她}给每位俘虏发了一把单发激光燧发枪，配备了一把刺刀，命令他们不惜一切代价夺取巡洋舰。作为交换，所有在这场突击中存活下来的人都可以得到神皇的赦免，成为部队的正式成员。战争时期，所有叛徒几乎都会被当场处决，他们很少能有悔改的机会，更不用说得到如此慷慨的赦罪。

languages.text: Der Lord Captain war gnädig. Jeder Gefangene erhielt einen Präzisionslaser mit einem einzigen Schuss und einem Bajonett, dann wurde Befehl erteilt, den Kreuzer um jeden Preis einzunehmen. Die Abmachung war simpel: Wer den Angriff überlebte, der würde vom Imperator begnadigt werden und durfte der Befreiungsarmee beitreten. Verräter in Kriegszeiten dürfen selten auf eine zweite Chance hoffen, und schon gar nicht auf ein solch großzügiges Angebot.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain was merciful. Each captive was issued a single-shot las fusil and bayonet, whereupon an order was given to take the cruiser at any cost. The deal was that those who survived the attack would be granted the Emperor's pardon and could enlist in the liberation army. Traitors in wartime can seldom hope to be given a second chance, let alone an offer of such generosity.

Jeder Gefangene erhielt einen Präzisionslaser mit einem einzigen Schuss und einem Bajonett, dann wurde Befehl erteilt, den Kreuzer um jeden Preis einzunehmen. Die Abmachung war simpel: Wer den Angriff überlebte, der würde vom Imperator begnadigt werden und durfte der Befreiungsarmee beitreten. Verräter in Kriegszeiten dürfen selten auf eine zweite Chance hoffen, und schon gar nicht auf ein solch großzügiges Angebot.

languages.text: {mf|El|La} Lord Capitán fue {mf|misericordioso|misericordiosa}. Cada cautivo recibió un fusil láser con bayoneta calada y un solo proyectil, tras lo cual se impartió la orden de tomar el crucero a cualquier precio, habiendo acordado con ellos que los supervivientes recibirían un indulto del Emperador y podrían alistarse en el ejército de liberación. En tiempos de guerra no suele concederse una segunda oportunidad a los traidores, y menos una oferta tan generosa.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain was merciful. Each captive was issued a single-shot las fusil and bayonet, whereupon an order was given to take the cruiser at any cost. The deal was that those who survived the attack would be granted the Emperor's pardon and could enlist in the liberation army. Traitors in wartime can seldom hope to be given a second chance, let alone an offer of such generosity.

traits.locale_text: {mf|El|La} Lord Capitán fue {mf|misericordioso|misericordiosa}. Cada cautivo recibió un fusil láser con bayoneta calada y un solo proyectil, tras lo cual se impartió la orden de tomar el crucero a cualquier precio, habiendo acordado con ellos que los supervivientes recibirían un indulto del Emperador y podrían alistarse en el ejército de liberación. En tiempos de guerra no suele concederse una segunda oportunidad a los traidores, y menos una oferta tan generosa.

languages.text: {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} a fait preuve de clémence. Les prisonniers se sont vus équipés d'un fusil laser à un coup et d'une baïonnette, puis ils ont reçu l'ordre de s'emparer du croiseur quel qu'en soit le prix. Ceux qui survivraient à l'attaque recevraient le pardon de l'Empereur et pourraient s'engager dans l'armée de libération. En temps de guerre, il est rare que l'on offre aux traîtres une seconde chance et encore moins dans des conditions aussi généreuses.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain was merciful. Each captive was issued a single-shot las fusil and bayonet, whereupon an order was given to take the cruiser at any cost. The deal was that those who survived the attack would be granted the Emperor's pardon and could enlist in the liberation army. Traitors in wartime can seldom hope to be given a second chance, let alone an offer of such generosity.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} a fait preuve de clémence. Les prisonniers se sont vus équipés d'un fusil laser à un coup et d'une baïonnette, puis ils ont reçu l'ordre de s'emparer du croiseur quel qu'en soit le prix. Ceux qui survivraient à l'attaque recevraient le pardon de l'Empereur et pourraient s'engager dans l'armée de libération. En temps de guerre, il est rare que l'on offre aux traîtres une seconde chance et encore moins dans des conditions aussi généreuses.

languages.text: ロード・キャプテンは慈悲深かった。捕虜一人一人に単発のラスフュージルと銃剣が支給され、何が何でも巡洋艦を奪取せよとの命令が下された。彼らとの取引は、攻撃を生き延びた者は皇帝の恩赦を受け、解放軍に入隊できるというものだった。戦時中の裏切り者は、このような寛大な申し出はおろか、２度目のチャンスを与えられることもめったにない。
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain was merciful. Each captive was issued a single-shot las fusil and bayonet, whereupon an order was given to take the cruiser at any cost. The deal was that those who survived the attack would be granted the Emperor's pardon and could enlist in the liberation army. Traitors in wartime can seldom hope to be given a second chance, let alone an offer of such generosity.

traits.locale_text: ロード・キャプテンは慈悲深かった。捕虜一人一人に単発のラスフュージルと銃剣が支給され、何が何でも巡洋艦を奪取せよとの命令が下された。彼らとの取引は、攻撃を生き延びた者は皇帝の恩赦を受け、解放軍に入隊できるというものだった。戦時中の裏切り者は、このような寛大な申し出はおろか、２度目のチャンスを与えられることもめったにない。

languages.text: Lord Kaptan bağışlayıcıydı. Her bir esire tek atışlık bir lazfusil ve süngü verildi. Emirler açıktı: Gemi, neye mal olursa olsun ele geçirilecekti. Saldırıdan sağ çıkanlar, İmparator'un merhametiyle tanışıp liberasyon ordusuna katılacaktı. Savaş zamanında insanlığa sırtını dönenler için ikinci şans umudu yok denecek kadar azdır, böyle bir bonkör bir teklif ise hainlerin aklının ucundan dahi geçemez.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain was merciful. Each captive was issued a single-shot las fusil and bayonet, whereupon an order was given to take the cruiser at any cost. The deal was that those who survived the attack would be granted the Emperor's pardon and could enlist in the liberation army. Traitors in wartime can seldom hope to be given a second chance, let alone an offer of such generosity.
